name: FCEUX TAS Editor Movie Capture File
summary: An FM3 file is a project created by the TAS Editor tool included with version 2.2.0 or later of FCEUX, an open-source Nintendo Entertainment System and Family Computer Disk System emulator. It contains information about a tool-assisted speedrun (TAS), which includes records of buttons pushed during gameplay in plain text and binary format, metadata, and TAS Editor-specific data.
